name: Helicopter Black Shark Gunship
summary:
Ultra realistic flight simulator of the Ka-50 attack helicopter. Black Shark offers an extreme level of realism in regards to flight dynamics, sound effects, and weapon systems.
You can roam the skies above various locations in Free Flight mode or enjoy the destruction power of the K-50 weapons in combat missions.
Black Shark brings a more realistic simulation experience than any other flight game for mobile devices.
